variable defined: TEST_SYSTEM=slim

smartrics.rest.fitnesse.fixture

Table: Rest Fixture http://localhost:8088
GET
Execution of Get caused exception 'Http call failed for IO failure'
 /employees/search/Doe 200 Content-Type : application/json
let id js JSON.parse(response.body)['id']
TypeError: Cannot read property "body" from null (unnamed script#1)


Table: Rest Fixture http://localhost:8088
setHeader
Content-Type : application/json
setBody { "age" : 38 }
PUT
Execution of Put caused exception 'Http call failed for IO failure'
 /employees/$id 200 jsonbody.age==38
